nodes.text: Gorgara was a female chirodactyl that resided on the planet Dathomir, known in local legends as "the winged daemon of the canyon." When Gorgara began to collect bones, it was a sign of unrest.
This female chirodactyl lived in areas that were very difficult to access, at altitudes that it was foolish to try to reach without a ship, or in the dark depths of gloomy canyons and caves.

With a wingspan of several dozen metres, eyes that seemed to be blind, enormous talons and a head reminiscent of an owl with teeth, Gorgara feared no rival. For good reason: she was classified as a super-predator, with no known carnivore that could take her down. Nevertheless, despite its power, size and the dangers that surrounded its territory, Gorgara was killed in a battle with the Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis after crashing into a wall of rock whilst attempting to throw Kestis from her hair.

Indeed, even with the clawed wingtips, the shockwave-inducing howl and its ability to spit a deadly dark substance, the Jedi severely wounded it in its lair, forcing it to flee. Gorgara counterattacked when Cal Kestis attempted to climb a cliffside to the upper reaches of the ruins of Dathomir. But injured and disoriented by the Jedi who clung to her neck, the chirodactyl hit many rocks in mid-air until she fell to her death.
